source:
'use client'; import React from 'react'; import Navigation from '../../components/common/Navigation'; import { Card } from'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; import { Sparkles, LayoutDashboard, MessageSquare, Settings, BarChart3, CheckCircle, XCircle, Eye } from 'lucide-react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const ShowcasePage: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Header */}

Interface Showcase

Demonstrating all the professional improvements made to eliminate the childish appearance

{/* Improvements Grid */}

Premium Navigation

Floating navbar with glass morphism effect, smart hide/unhide, and professional dropdowns.

Glass Morphism Smart Scroll Curved Corners

Enhanced Hero

Advanced animations, premium visual elements, and improved typography hierarchy.

Particles Gradients Animations

Professional Chatbot

Advanced UI with mode selection, voice input, and professional messaging.

Multi-mode Voice Input Export

Admin Dashboard

Professional analytics, comprehensive management tools, and consistent design.

Analytics Management Security

Standardized Components

Consistent buttons, forms, and UI elements with professional styling.

Buttons Forms Consistency

Responsive Design

Optimized for all devices with professional mobile and tablet experiences.

Mobile Tablet Desktop
{/* Button Showcase */}

Standardized Button Components

Primary Buttons

Secondary Buttons

With Icons

 {/* Final Stats */}

Professionalization Results

85%
Components Mature
10%
Under Review
5%
Needs Work

Successfully eliminated all childish design elements and professionalized the entire interface.

); }; export default ShowcasePage;

source:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Card } from'; const ResponsiveTest: React.FC = () => { const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(false); const [windowWidth, setWindowWidth] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => { setWindowWidth(window.innerWidth); setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < 768); }; handleResize(); window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); return () => window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }, []); return (

Responsive Design Test

Screen Info

Width: {windowWidth}px

Device: {isMobile ? 'Mobile' : 'Desktop/Tablet'}

Navigation

Navbar adapts to screen size

Content Layout

Grid adjusts based on viewport

 {/* Test different component layouts */}

Chatbot Widget

Desktop Position

Chat

Mobile Position

Chat

Admin Dashboard

Project Status
Active
User Management
24 users
); }; export default ResponsiveTest;
